name: Never Trust The Shady Ones
description:
-Description:

You play as a young man which needs to catch Tech Support scammers.

You mission is to get the scammer's private details and report them to a report page in your Browser.

-Credits:

Core Programming: Asumji

Sound: Asumji

Art: 큐우

Idea: 큐우

-Creation Info:

This game was made in 72 hours for the BenBonk Game Jam #1

I hope you enjoy and don't forget to rate it!
